title: A hands-on guide for people who want to install and use Sockstrace.
abstract: Join us for a practical session on auditing network traffic. In this workshop, you will learn how to use SocksTrace to intercept, analyze, and socksify applications.
description:
Workshop Plan:
- Setup & Installation
- Basic Usage (Detecting Leaks)
- Advanced Configuration (Whitelist/Blacklist)
- Q&A and Debugging (Troubleshooting common setup)
